WorkItem.Description:
hello, i have a problem with setting the itemssource property of a DataGridComboBoxColumn to a collection.
my collection is the viewmodel and is exposed as a public property. 
that viewmodel is the datacontext for my usercontrol. 
the datagrid is also part of this usercontrol.
if i place an ordinary combobox inside that usercontrol the syntax
<ComboBox ItemsSource={Binding myCollection} /> works fine.
but i tried several times to do the same with a datagridcomboboxcolumn and it failed. why is that?
